question: Which of the following is not a feature of Parliamentary Form of Government?
option1: President is the head of the State as well as Government
option2: The ministers are members of the legislature as well as executive
option3: The executive is responsible to the parliament and can be removed by a no confidence
option4: The President is not a member of either House of Parliament
answer: President is the head of the State as well as Government
explanation: First statement is incorrect because in parliamentary form of government president is the head of the State but the head of the government is prime minister
